attributes.action: To Aid & supply essentials to Bangladesh to those who are effected by flood.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the governments can help Aid support and essentials. Bangladesh have helped UK in the past with many problems and still are. Bangladesh see UK as their second home they need to be rescued. I believe the government/ parliament can raise awareness and send support and love. Bangladesh sylhet is 90% under the flood they have no gas or electric to ask for help they are very helpless no one has eaten in days the dirty water is full of bacteria. Banks are closed delivery service are closed.
attributes.background: Please help Sylhet in Bangladesh they need food, water, medicine and funding for their homes. Families have died the flood is getting worse. Bangladesh needs support from UK because UK is their second home.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618691
